long_desc: A beer barrel has been left here.
A beer bottle has been left here.
A dark bottle of ale has been left here.
A firebreather has been left here.
A dark bottle has been left here.
A loaf of bread has been left here.
A nice looking delicious danish pastry has been placed here.
A dagger with a long thin blade is here.

extra_descs.desc: The small sword seems to have an inscription of some sort.
It says : May this sword be a good companion.

long_desc: A small sword lies here.
A long sword has been left here.
A simpel looking wooden club is here.
A medium sized warhammer is here.
A large torch.
A brass lantern.
A small bag.
A small box.
A paper note has been left here.
A goose-feather quill is lying here.

extra_descs.desc:
The scroll has a magic formula drawn upon it:
     ???
    ?   ?
       ?
      ?
      ?
      *

long_desc: A scroll has carelessly been left here.

extra_descs.desc: The potion has a small label 'Detect The Invisible'.

long_desc: A small yellow potion has carelessly been left here.
short_desc: a yellow potion of see invisible

extra_descs.desc: The scroll has written a formulae of 'Word of Recall' upon it.

long_desc: A scroll has carelessly been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
The wand is an old dark stick. You notice a small symbol etched at the
base of the wand. It looks like this:

     \ /
    - O -
     / \

long_desc: A wand has carelessly been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
The staff is made of old oak, and is around five feet long. It fits
perfectly into your hand. You notice a small symbol etched at the
base of the staff, it looks like:

  ZZZZZ
     Z
    Z
   Z
  ZZZZZ  z   z

long_desc: A staff has carelessly been left here.
A scale mail jacket is lying on the ground.
A bronze breast plate is lying on the ground.

extra_descs.desc: The raft looks very primitive.

long_desc: A raft has been left here.

extra_descs.desc: The canoe is fairly light.

long_desc: A canoe has been left here.

     \ /

    Z

long_desc: A staff has carelessly been left here.
A leather jerkin is lying on the ground.
A leather cap is lying on the ground.
A pair of leather pants is lying on the ground.
A pair of leather boots lies here.
A pair of leather gloves is lying on the ground.
A pair of leather sleeves is lying on the ground.
A studded leather jerkin is lying on the ground.
A hard leather cap is lying on the ground.
A pair of studded leather pants is lying on the ground.

long_desc: A pair of hard leather boots lies here.
short_desc: a pair of hard leather boots

long_desc: A pair of hard leather gloves is lying on the ground.
short_desc: a pair of hard leather gloves

long_desc: A pair of studded leather sleeves is lying on the ground.
short_desc: a pair of studded leather sleeves

long_desc: A scale mail jerkin is lying on the ground.
A scale mail coif is lying on the ground.
A long scale mail skirt is lying on the ground.
A pair of reinforced boots lies here.

A pair of scale mail sleeves is lying on the ground.

long_desc: A chain mail jerkin is lying on the ground.
A chain mail coif is lying on the ground.
A long chain mail skirt is lying on the ground.
A pair of ironbound boots lies here.
A pair of ironbound gloves is lying on the ground.
A pair of chain mail sleeves is lying on the ground.

long_desc: A bronze breast plate is lying on the ground.
A bronze helmet is lying on the ground.
A pair of bronze leggings is lying on the ground.
A pair of bronze boots is lying on the ground.
A pair of bronze gauntlets is lying on the ground.
A pair of bronze bracers is lying on the ground.

An iron helmet is lying on the ground.
A pair of iron leggings is lying on the ground.
A pair of iron boots is lying on the ground.
A pair of iron gauntlets is lying on the ground.
A pair of iron bracers is lying on the ground.
A small wooden shield is lying on the ground.
A small metal shield is lying on the ground.
A large metal shield is lying on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
Use "Look AT board" to see a listing of the messages. Use "Read
<message number>" or "Remove <message number>" to read or remove
a message, respectively.

long_desc: A large bulletin board is mounted on a wall here.

extra_descs.desc: It is a small simple cup.

long_desc: A cup has been set here.

extra_descs.desc: It is a small simple cup.

long_desc: A cup has been set here.

extra_descs.desc: It is a large simple cup.

long_desc: A cup has been set here.

extra_descs.desc: The iron key is not special.

long_desc: An iron key has been left here.

extra_descs.desc: The key is a fairly large rusty key.  You notice some fresh dirt on it.

long_desc: A rusty key has been left here.

extra_descs.desc: The wooden key is not special.

long_desc: A wooden key has been left here.

extra_descs.desc: The brass key is small and looks like it fits a very complicated lock.

long_desc: A brass key has been left here.
A pair of hand cuffs has been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a quite heavy but very comfortable bench.  It is placed with its front
towards the river so you can sit and watch the river and the houses on the
other side.

long_desc: A white-painted wooden bench is standing here.

extra_descs.desc: It is very nice.  Made from fine white marble.

long_desc: A small white fountain is standing at the end of the road.
A small pile of gold coins lies here.
short_desc: a small pile of gold coins

extra_descs.desc: A key of this size must fit a very strong lock.

long_desc: A large steel key has been left here.

extra_descs.desc: You notice 'My Cottage' has been inscribed on the key.

long_desc: A small metal key has been dropped here.

extra_descs.desc:
It looks as if it is very old.  There are some small marks on it as if
somebody with tiny (but strong!) teeth has been biting a lot in it.

long_desc: An old brass key has been dropped here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a small insignificant metal key on which the letter "M" has been
inscribed.

long_desc: A small metal key has been dropped here.

extra_descs.desc:
It looks too bulky to be moved and does not appear to be equipped with a
lock.

long_desc: A large chest is standing next to the bed.

extra_descs.desc:
A beautifully crafted mace of mithril.  You can see the owners name on the
adamantine handle.  The name, which is chiselled into the handle and then
filled with diamond dust, is Manxam.

long_desc: Manxam's heavy mace is lying here.

extra_descs.desc:
A good-looking breastplate made of brass.  It's engraved a lot, the largest
engraving being the name of the owner, Manxam.

long_desc: Manxam's brass breast plate is lying on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
A pair of brass leggings, well crafted, with the owners name engraved on
them.  The name is, of course, Manxam.

long_desc: Manxam's brass leggings are lying on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
The small mithril key is a sample of exquisite workmanship.  It has the
letter "G" inscribed.

long_desc: A small mithril key has been dropped here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a big old-fashioned thing that most of all resembles a cupboard with a
slot large enough to hold three cans of Coke at once.  It doesn't appear to
have any buttons or any other means of control.  Golden letters on its front
tell that this is a Quifatronic K-1000 mk I.

long_desc: A Coke machine is standing here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a small red and white can that has 'Keep MudLand tidy' written on its
side and the name Gimli printed on its bottom.

long_desc: A can of Coke been left here.

extra_descs.desc: The small iron key has the letter "D" inscribed on its surface.

long_desc: A small iron key has been dropped here.

extra_descs.desc:
This is where you put money and items to help Doz expand this shrine and
convert more people to the belief of Eru our creator.

long_desc: A pit for sacrifices is in the north part of the hall.

extra_descs.desc:
This breast plate is made of solid gold, yet it seems to be as hard as a
normal steel plate. The name 'Doz' is engraved in silver letters on it.

long_desc: A golden breast plate is lying on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
This helmet is made of solid gold. On the inside of it you find the name
'Doz' engraved in silver letters.

long_desc: A golden helmet is lying on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
These sleeves are made of gold and they have the name 'Doz' engraved in
silver letters on them.

long_desc: A pair of golden sleeves is lying on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
This cloak is woven from the finest threads of gold, and it shimmers as you
look at it. You find the name 'Doz' written on the inside of it.

long_desc: A golden cloak is lying on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
This shield is made of gold and it's covered with strange silver runes
which you guess must be of protection. The name 'Doz' is also to be found
on the shield.

long_desc: A golden shield is lying on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
These gauntlets are made of gold and they have the name 'Doz' engraved in
silver letters on them.

long_desc: A pair of golden gauntlets is lying on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
These leggings are made of solid gold, and the name 'Doz' is engraved in
silver letters on them.

long_desc: A pair of golden leggings is lying on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a big old-fashioned thing that most of all resembles a cupboard with a
slot large enough to hold three cans of Coke at once.  It doesn't appear to
have any buttons or any other means of control.  Golden letters on its front
tell that this is a Quifatronic K-1000 mk I.

long_desc: A Coke machine is standing here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a small red and white can that has 'Keep MudLand tidy' written on its
side and the name Doz printed on its bottom.

long_desc: A can of Coke been left here.

extra_descs.desc: The small iron key has the letter "M" inscribed on its surface.

long_desc: A small iron key has been dropped here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a big old-fashioned thing that most of all resembles a cupboard with a
slot large enough to hold three cans of Coke at once.  It doesn't appear to
have any buttons or any other means of control.  Golden letters on its front
tell that this is a Quifatronic K-1000 mk I.

long_desc: A Coke machine is standing here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a small red and white can that has 'Keep MudLand tidy' written on its
side and the name Mapmaker printed on its bottom.

long_desc: A can of Coke been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a rather old-looking three-armed candlestick made from pewter.  Its
candles are a yellowish white colour.

long_desc: A pewter candlestick is standing here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a rather old-looking three-armed candlestick made from pewter.  Its
candles are a yellowish white colour.

long_desc: A pewter candlestick is standing here.

extra_descs.desc:
The bottle is a special 'Dragon Blood' brandy bottle.  Its neck is shaped
like a small dragon's head.  Bottles like these are often worth a small
amount money, even when empty.

long_desc: A brandy bottle is lying here.

extra_descs.desc:
The bottle is a special 'Dragon Blood' brandy bottle.  Its neck is shaped
like a small dragon's head.  Bottles like these are often worth some money,
even when empty.

long_desc: A brandy bottle is lying here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a heavy wheelbarrow made from solid oaken planks that have been painted
a dark, green colour.

long_desc: A green-painted wheelbarrow is standing here.

extra_descs.desc: It is a large metal shovel with a solid wooden handle.

long_desc: A shovel is lying here.

extra_descs.desc: It is a large metal rake with a solid wooden handle.

long_desc: A rake is lying here.

extra_descs.desc:
The dusty bones are almost brown.  It must have been buried for very long
time.

long_desc: A dusty skeleton lies here.

extra_descs.desc: It has a very deep purple colour.

long_desc: A large, beautifully polished amethyst has been left here.

extra_descs.desc: It resembles Thor's hammer and appears to be made of solid silver.

long_desc: A silver pendant has been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
It has a long, sharp blade that is made entirely from silver.  A small rune
has been engraved on the blade next to the hilt.

long_desc: A long silver dagger is lying here.

extra_descs.desc: It feels heavy.

long_desc: A ring, with yellow and green ornamentation. It looks very old.
A halfways decayed corpse of a goblin.
A small pile of coins.

extra_descs.desc: It looks rather strange!

long_desc: A purple potion is here.

extra_descs.desc: It looks somehow magical!.

long_desc: A metal helmet in here.

extra_descs.desc: Let's put it this way - I wouldn't eat it !

long_desc: A small mushroom is here.

extra_descs.desc: It looks informative.

long_desc: A scroll which reads "ysafg", it looks very fragile and quite old.

extra_descs.desc: It wasn't mend to be food, - Certainly not for humans.

long_desc: A green slime mold is here. Stinks like sh**.

extra_descs.desc: It wasn't mend to be food, - Certainly not for humans.

long_desc: A green slime mold is here. Stinks like sh**.

extra_descs.desc: It looks healthy.

long_desc: A thick black potion is here.

extra_descs.desc: You see it has some sort of runes on it.
The runes says : Funthark.

long_desc: A ancient heavy oak staff is here.

extra_descs.desc: It looks like an exelent tool for theives.

long_desc: A light silver dagger is here.

extra_descs.desc: This herb smells rather spicy, maybe you should try it ?

long_desc: Some herbs is lying here, small green leaves and tiny pink flowers.
short_desc: a small dusk of timian herbs

long_desc: Some poison ivy is growing here.
short_desc: a small dusk of poison ivy

extra_descs.desc:
The jar is made of dry clay, covered with markings suggesting it's
occult origin.

long_desc: A small jar in a dark, red colour.
A bunch of pretty wild flowers is here.

extra_descs.desc:
The waterskin is made of carved leather.
It looks as if it's of fair quality.

long_desc: A waterskin is lying on the ground here.
A slice of beef jerkey has been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
Judging from the signs inscripted in the amulet, you gather it must
have belonged to a druid.
It is weird looking with symbols from nature dominating it.

long_desc: A strange looking amulet is lying here, half covered with dust.

extra_descs.desc:
Then staff is about 5 ft long, engraved with mythical signs and figures.
Otherwise the staff seems of no real interrest.

long_desc: A staff with druidic marks have been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
Well the rabbit looks rather dead.
You guess that this once was a ferocious rabbit who's life now has
changed to that of a tasty wabbit woast.

long_desc: You see a deliciously looking rabbit roast.

extra_descs.desc:
The template is made of an exotic green metal and looks
centuries old.
Inscriped upon is the words 'Ep ep fi'hur G'harne
                             G'harne fhtagn Shudde-M'ell hyas Negg'h'
And beneath the inscription you see horrifying death scenes depicted.

long_desc: A strange template made of an exotic green metal is placed here

extra_descs.desc:
As you examine the potion more, you notice the oddities of this
potion. When you look through it you notice strange things...
The clear potion is certainly not of this world.

long_desc: A clear potion wrapped in leather is unnoticed placed here.

extra_descs.desc:
The scroll is titled 'jhyfrdow' and looks very old.
As you examine it closer you notice primitive drawings of
men doing some kind of a ritual.

The drawing pictures people gathered round giant stone formations,
worshipping a giant worm like creature.
It seems they are sacrificing some of their own species.

long_desc: An odd looking scroll is here.

extra_descs.desc: It is a heavy axe of the kind lumberjacks use to chop down trees.

long_desc: A heavy lumber axe lies here.

extra_descs.desc: It is an extra large, chequered shirt made from heavy cloth.

long_desc: A chequered shirt lies here.

extra_descs.desc:
They are fashioned from rough leather that has been oiled frequently to make
it stay waterproof.  They look worn but quite functional.

long_desc: A pair of leather boots lies here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is fashioned from stones of various sizes that have been stacked on top of
each other and fastened with mortar.  Its chimney is constructed likewise and
leads the smoke out through the low cabin ceiling.

long_desc: A fireplace made from stone is set against the east wall.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a large and robust but somewhat battered oil lantern made from brass,
and it is equipped with a handle to make it handy and a hood to protect its
flame.  Some letters have been scratched on its bottom.
They say, "Use 'hold lantern' to activate."

long_desc: A hooded brass lantern has been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a robust chest made from short, heavy planks that have been fastened
together with tenons.  It is equipped with a simple brass lock.

long_desc: A wooden chest stands in the corner.

extra_descs.desc: It is a small, simple brass key with no inscriptions or marks of any kind.

long_desc: A small brass key lies here.

extra_descs.desc: The coins seem to be gold.  They are obviously valuable.

long_desc: Some gold coins lie piled up in a heap on the floor.

extra_descs.desc: They look very tasty indeed.

long_desc: Some blackberries grow on a bush nearby.

extra_descs.desc: It is a tasty little thing.

long_desc: A small mushroom grows nearby.

extra_descs.desc:
Not the most interesting pole in the world.
Better leave it here, though, as it holds the sign in place.

It says :-

                         Haon-Dor
                         --------

 This is the Forest of Haon-Dor.  Enter at your own risk.
     Please report any strange occurrences to Quifael.

long_desc: A large sign mounted on a pole is standing by the roadside.
A water barrel has been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
Only some of the letters are legible :-
                _
      _________| |_________
     /         | |         \
    /  CAR.AX  | |  M.STY   \
    \  M..SI.N | |  SW..P   /
     \_________| |_________/
               | |

long_desc: An old, battered sign lies on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
This enourmous tree must be a thousand years old.  Its rough bark looks grey
and pale and is decorated with scratches and clawmarks.  On its west side is a
small opening just above ground level.

The opening is far too narrow for you to squeeze through but it looks as if the
tree is hollow.

long_desc: A colossal tree blocks the way westwards.

extra_descs.desc:
It is quite heavy and looks as if it has been dropped from great height.  It is
long dead and very dry.  Could probably be lighted quite easily.

long_desc: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
It is very heavy and looks as if it has been dropped from great height.  It is
long and straight and the wood is very hard, still being full of sap.  Although
it does not fit very well in your hand, it could be used as a clumsy but very
heavy weapon.

long_desc: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
It is very heavy and looks as if it has been dropped from great height.  It is
somewhat twisted and the hard wood is still full of sap.

long_desc: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a large, brown boletus that must weigh nearly five pounds.  The top
surface is covered in a thin layer of transparent slime that emits a weak,
musty smell.  Not the most delicious thing you have seen.

long_desc: A large toadstool grows nearby.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a large, brown boletus that must weigh nearly five pounds.  It has small
white spots and the top surface is covered in a thin layer of transparent slime
that emits a weak, musty smell.  Not the most delicious thing you have seen.

long_desc: A large toadstool grows nearby.
A big pile of gold coins is lying here.
short_desc: a big pile of gold coins

extra_descs.desc: It has a nice sky blue colour and a smell like peppermint.

long_desc: A blue potion has been left here.

extra_descs.desc: It has a deep yellow colour and and a strong spicy smell.

long_desc: A yellow potion has been left here.

extra_descs.desc: It is made from hard wood that has been reinforced with heavy iron bands.

long_desc: A large round shield has been left here.

extra_descs.desc: It is a heavy human-sized crown made from solid iron.

long_desc: An iron crown rests on the ground.

extra_descs.desc: It is a heavy sceptre made from solid iron.

long_desc: An iron sceptre lies on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a quite heavy human-sized ring made from solid iron.  It lacks
decorations of any kind.

long_desc: An iron ring has been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a very unpredictable piece of software, consisting mostly of
self-modifying code and inexcusable goto commands.  Looks very dangerous.

long_desc: Quifael's global optimizer has been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a sleeveless shirt made from big, black dragon scales joined with silver
threads.  Its inside has been made from the soft skin on the dragon's belly,
making it very comfortable to wear.  The name "Isha" has been engraved on one
of the scales.

long_desc: A black dragon scale shirt has been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a short skirt made from big, black dragon scales joined with silver
threads.  Its inside has been made from the soft skin on the dragon's belly,
making it very comfortable to wear.  The name "Isha" has been engraved on one
of the scales.

long_desc: A black dragon scale skirt has been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a heavy, black cloak with a large hood.  The name "Isha" is written
inside it with a silver thread.

long_desc: A large, hooded cloak, as dark as the night, has been left here.

extra_descs.desc: It is a broad belt made from tiny silver rings woven together.

long_desc: A broad silver belt has been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a long, slender sword that seems to be made from silver.  The name
"Isha" has been engraved on the hilt.

long_desc: A long, slender sword lies on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a big old-fashioned thing that most of all resembles a cupboard with a
slot large enough to hold three coffee cups at once.  It doesn't appear to
have any buttons or any other means of control.  Golden letters on its front
tell that this is a Quifatronic C-1000 mk I.

long_desc: A coffee machine is standing here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a small white throwaway cup that has 'Keep MudLand tidy' written on its
side and 'Quifatronic C-1000 mk I' on its bottom.

long_desc: A coffee cup has been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a very heavy scythe.  The grey handle is made from hard wood and the long
iron blade is completely smooth from countless years of use.  It feels cold to
the touch.

long_desc: The Scythe of Death rests heavily on the ground.

extra_descs.desc:
The waybread is the traditional feed of elves when travelling, they call it
lembas.  It is said to refresh the weary traveler greatly.

long_desc: Some waybread has been put here.
A lovely silverring has been left here.
A shiny goldring has been abandoned here.
A shiny bronzering has been abandoned here.
A shiny brassring has been abandoned here.

extra_descs.desc:
This is indeed a mysterious rod.  It is dark black at the base but has four
very sharp purple tentacles at the end.

long_desc: The mysterious devil rod lies on the floor.

extra_descs.desc:
The mace is pretty large with a weight of 10 lbs.  The head is actually four
purple tentacles tied together.

long_desc: A large mace lies here.

extra_descs.desc:
This weapon does look like it does a lot of damage, but then you never know.
It consists of a black handle and a purple head.

long_desc: a small mace has been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
This is a very fine made cloak from an unknown material, in a nice purple
color.

long_desc: A purple cloak lies on the floor.

extra_descs.desc: In the flask is a transparent blue liquid.

long_desc: A neon blue potion stands on the floor.

extra_descs.desc: This little key is made from a black metal of unknown origin.

long_desc: A black key has been left on the floor.

extra_descs.desc:
The skull has two small horns in the forehead. You notice some writing on
the inside.
You read the number '666'.

long_desc: A strange white skull lies on the floor looking at you.

extra_descs.desc: These gauntlets are muddy indeed, however they look very effective.

long_desc: A pair of muddy gauntlets have been thrown away here.

extra_descs.desc:
The small stick does not look interesting at all.  But just as you are going
to throw it away you notice some small letters.
It reads 'Hold me'.

long_desc: A small stick lies here.
A pair of muddy boots has been dropped here.

extra_descs.desc: This looks like a whole lot of coins.

long_desc: There is a huge treasure here, looking very valuable.

extra_descs.desc: This is a very nice little weapon.

long_desc: There lies a short sword.

extra_descs.desc: Quite a heavy weapon, with a pure white hilt.

long_desc: There is a huge bastard sword here.

extra_descs.desc: This looks like some heavy protection, for the head of course.

long_desc: There is a large helmet on the floor.

extra_descs.desc:
This helmet has mounted some mean looking spikes on the front, moreover it
looks like good protection.

long_desc: On the floor is a grand evil-looking caos helmet.

extra_descs.desc: This looks as a sabre out of an wellknown SF-movie.

long_desc: On the floor lies a strange looking sabre.

extra_descs.desc:
You notice that there has been inscribed some runes and a sort of pattern,
which resembles flames running along the edge.
On the blade you can read 'Flame And Strength United Are My Soul Power'.

long_desc: On the floor rests a enormous two-handed sword.

extra_descs.desc:
On the breast plate you notive a relief of large rose. The metal seems to be
some kind of silver or platinium.

long_desc: There is a silvery breast plate on the floor.

extra_descs.desc: They seem to be made from silver or platinum. You see the outline of a rose.

long_desc: On the floor you see some leg plates.

extra_descs.desc: The gloves are made of silver threads.

long_desc: You can see a pair of gloves on the floor.

extra_descs.desc:
The helmet is made from platinum or silver and has a white fur brush attached
on the top.

long_desc: The silvery helmet lies here.

extra_descs.desc:
On the shield you see a clear and perfect painting of a dark red rose on a white
background. You also notice the inscription :'Pax Est Sanctuum'.

long_desc: The shield of the rose rests on the floor.

extra_descs.desc: The boots are made from a silvery metal.

long_desc: A pair of heavy plated boots stand on the floor.
short_desc: a pair of heavy plated boots

extra_descs.desc: They seem to be made from silver or platinum. You see the outline of a rose.

long_desc: On the floor you see some arm plates.

extra_descs.desc:
This is a very fine made cloak from an unknown material, in a bright white
color.

long_desc: A white cloak lies on the floor.

extra_descs.desc: Looks like a LOT of coins.

long_desc: a huge treasure is lying here, looking very valuable.

extra_descs.desc: This is a very nice little weapon.

long_desc: There lies a short sword.
A bacpack stands upright here.
A large beltpouch lies here on the ground.
A tube-like scrollcase has been left here.

extra_descs.desc: On the polished steel you can just see the outline of a knight in battle.

long_desc: There is a steel torso plate on the floor.

extra_descs.desc: They seem to be made from steel, and they are fit to be worn on your thighs.

long_desc: On the floor you see two steel tassets
You can see a pair of large gauntlets on the floor.

extra_descs.desc: The helmet is made from steel.

long_desc: The steel helmet lies here.
The large metal shield rests on the floor.

extra_descs.desc:
The greaves are made from solid steel, presumably. These are plated guards
to be set in front of your shins, so that these will be well protected.
Go ahead - wear them.

long_desc: A pair of heavy metal greaves lie on the floor.
short_desc: a pair of heavily plated greaves

long_desc: On the ground you see two steel arm guards.

extra_descs.desc: This huge key is made from solid steel.

long_desc: A large steel key has been left here.

extra_descs.desc: This little key is made from copper.

long_desc: A copper key has been left on the floor.

extra_descs.desc: Looks like a LOT of coins. A big one of them has writing on it.

It reads : "Hi Conan, no more coins from here, Pal. :)
                         Signed  Redferne  ".

long_desc: a huge treasure is lying here, looking very valuable.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a robust chest made from short, heavy planks that have been fastened
together with tenons.  It is equipped with a simple brass lock.

long_desc: A wooden chest stands in the corner.

extra_descs.desc: It is a small, simple brass key with no inscriptions or marks of any kind.

long_desc: A small brass key lies here.
A small metal key with a blue handle has been left here.
A small metal key with a red handle has been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is app. 2 X 5" big, with a purple stripe down the middle of the long
side. Arrayed by the stripe are a number of very small holes, obviously
set in some meaningful pattern.

long_desc: A small strip of aluminum is lying here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is about 10" across, made from a thin sheet of metal, and the
remains of something that smells like chili has been allowed to get
_really_ attached to it.

long_desc: There is a dirty dish standing here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is 10 X 15 X 2", and quite regular. It is transparent, and, while
probably not glass, it still feels like glass. There are a large number
of tiny, needlethin blue lines inside it, and a 1 X 1" square red
button near one corner.

As you push the button, a message appears on the slab, in glowing
blue letters:
                       SPECIAL EFFECTS PROGRAM
                          NOT OPERABLE YET

long_desc: There is chunk of glass lying here.

extra_descs.desc:
It looks like an ordinary thighbone, except that it is carved from
glass by somebody very good. It is quite heavy, but somewhat clumsy to
swing, should one use it as a weapon.

long_desc: There is a glass-like bone lying here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a wicked cord of spun metal, amazingly supple and light, and set
with nasty little razor-like blades on the outer third, about one yd.

long_desc: A strange, metallic blue whip has been carelessly left here.

extra_descs.desc:
While the bag in it self look ordinary enough, even perhaps somewhat
dingy, the closing mechanism is rather unusual (and somewhat noisy), as
it consists of to strips of strange cloth which sticks to each other
like burrs, but doesn't stick to anything else. It makes a loud 'ripping'
sound when opened.

long_desc: A scuffed and worn leather satchel has been left here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is big, 3 meters wide and more than two meters tall, leaving plenty of air
above it under the ceiling. There is a large door set in the side, and a solid-
looking handle and lock in the door.

The lock-and-handle arrangement is rather strange. Apparently, one inserts a
cylindrical key, then lift a lever (?).

long_desc: There is a large cabinet here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a small tube, 5" by 1" diameter. There is a number of flanges and studs
along one end, set in some pattern, and the cylinder flattens to a metal strip
in the other.

long_desc: There is a small cylindrical object lying here

extra_descs.desc:
It is an unusual spanner... It seems to be designed for bolts that have, not
as would be usual hexagonal heads, but rather starshaped heads... It has no
other distinguishing features.

long_desc: There is a spanner lying here

extra_descs.desc: It is large, yet gracefully made, obviously of scandinavian design.

long_desc: There is a wooden closet tucked into a corner.
A small unlabeled spice jar is standing here.
Some strong-smelling black powder has been carelessly scattered here.

extra_descs.desc: Look fairly dull...

long_desc: Some small yellow kernels have been accidentally left here.

extra_descs.desc:
It looks old and worn, but You can still make out a faint lettering on it,
written in a strange, alien hand:

o    WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING!   o
o                                                                     o
o    MSGS: MATRIX CONTROL      TO   SUBSYSTEMS/<ALL>                  o
o    ACT : REQUIRED            T:   NOW                               o
o                                                                     o
o    RECENT DATAQUAKE EVALUATED... EVALUATION FOLLOWS...              o
o    MASSIVE SEGMENTATION HAS OCCURRED... ALL SUBSIDIARY SECTORS      o
o    SHUTDOWN... CENTRAL SHUTDOWN: AUTOMATICS ENGAGED...              o
o                                                                     o
o    DATALEAK DETECTED... DIRECTION:FOREIGN VIRTUAL REALITY, CODENAME o
o    ASSIGNED: 'Midgaard'...                                          o
o    SPECIFIC LOCATION: UNCERTAIN, BEING WITHIN 'Midgaard' SUBSECTOR  o
o    CODENAME ASSIGNED: 'Holy Grove'...                               o
o    BEWARE INTRUSIONS POSSIBLE. ADVISE EXTREME CAUTION...            o
o    .                                                                o
o    .                                                                o
o    .                                                                o
o                                                                     o
o    MSGS: MATRIX CONTROL      TO   SUBSYSTEMS/<Sark>                 o
o                                              <101110101101>         o
o                                              <1101111010101101>     o
o    ACT : URGENT              T:   IMMIDIATE                         o
o                                                                     o
o    INTRUDERS DETECTED IN MAIN MATRIX... DIRECTIVE SEARCH AND        o
o    ELIMINATE...                                                     o
o    .                                                                o
o    .                                                                o
o                                                                     o

long_desc: There is a crumpled wad of paper here, left behind by some messy bypasser.

extra_descs.desc:
It is 10 X 15 X 2", and quite regular. It is transparent, and, while
probably not glass, it still feels like glass. There are a large number
of tiny, needlethin blue lines inside it, and a 1 X 1" square red
button near one corner.

As you push the button, a message appears on the slab, in glowing
blue letters:
                       SPECIAL EFFECTS PROGRAM
                          NOT OPERABLE YET

long_desc: There is chunk of glass lying here.

extra_descs.desc:
It is a wicked cord of spun metal, amazingly supple and light, and set
with nasty little razor-like blades on the outer third, about one yd.

long_desc: A strange, metallic blue whip has been carelessly left here.
